main event: A bright object approximately 50 feet in diameter hovered near Houston, Texas, for over 30 minutes.
interesting points: The object was light blue with orange strobe-like flashes., The object hovered at an elevation of approximately 5,000 feet., A civilian at Chennault AFB described the object as a bright falling metallic object., A pilot at Houston International Airport spotted a similar object at the same time., Additional checks revealed no satellite passovers or missile firings in conjunction with the sighting.
sighted object: bright object approximately 50 feet in diameter
witness description: calm and intelligent, described the object as unusual particularly in broad daylight
